Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."PPA_GETRATE" ( cClient VARCHAR2 , cProject VARCHAR2 , cCharge_Code VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, cInput_Type VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, cResource_Code VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, cLocation VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, cDepartCode VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, in_cTransType IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, cTransDate VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, nQuantity NUMBER DEFAULT NULL, bAsResultSet NUMBER DEFAULT 1, nAmount IN OUT NUMBER, nRate IN OUT NUMBER, nCost IN OUT NUMBER, nStdCost IN OUT NUMBER, nFactorAmt IN OUT NUMBER, nBurdenAmt IN OUT NUMBER, nOverheadAmt IN OUT NUMBER, cCostPlusCode IN OUT VARCHAR2, --cCostRuleCode IN OUT VARCHAR2, bRateFound IN OUT NUMBER, budgetcall NUMBER DEFAULT 0, bCostOverride NUMBER DEFAULT 0, currencyCodeReturned IN OUT VARCHAR2, costCurrencyCode IN OUT VARCHAR2, RC1 IN OUT Ppa_Getratepkg.RCT1, cCost_type VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL) AS cRoleCode VARCHAR2(32) := NULL ; cSystemCurrency VARCHAR2(32) := NULL ; BEGIN Ppa_Getrate_WithRole ( cClient => cClient, cProject=>cProject, cCharge_Code=>cCharge_Code, cInput_Type=>cInput_Type, cResource_Code=>cResource_Code, cLocation=>cLocation, cDepartCode=>cDepartCode, in_cTransType=>in_cTransType, cTransDate=>cTransDate, nQuantity=>nQuantity, bAsResultSet=>bAsResultSet, nAmount=>nAmount, nRate=>nRate, nCost=>nCost, nStdCost=>nStdCost, nFactorAmt=>nFactorAmt, nBurdenAmt=>nBurdenAmt, nOverheadAmt=>nOverheadAmt, cCostPlusCode=>cCostPlusCode, --cCostRuleCode=>cCostRuleCode, bRateFound=>bRateFound, budgetcall=>budgetcall, bCostOverride=>bCostOverride, currencyCodeReturned=>currencyCodeReturned, costCurrencyCode=>costCurrencyCode, cRoleCode=>cRoleCode, cTransClass=>null, RC1=>RC1, cSystemCurrency=>null, cCost_type=>cCost_type ) ; END Ppa_Getrate;
